code: import axios from'axios';const baseUrl='https://course-full-stack-open.onrender.com/api/persons';const getAll=()=>{return axios.get(baseUrl);};const create=newObject=>{return axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);};const update=(id,newObject)=>{return axios.put(`${baseUrl}/${id}`,newObject);};const deletePerson=id=>{return axios.delete(`${baseUrl}/${id}`);};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,deletePerson:deletePerson};
